-  kVTVideoEncoderList_InstanceLimit 

Global Variable# kVTVideoEncoderList_InstanceLimit

iOS 13.0+iPadOS 13.0+Mac Catalyst 13.1+macOS 10.14+tvOS 13.0+visionOS 1.0+

```
let kVTVideoEncoderList_InstanceLimit: CFString
```
